sys_script_include.description: On demand Script Include to validate email address syntax using regular expressions.
sys_script_include.name: validateEmailAddress

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_ac0facf5d3c791105f2246c7c0085171
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>x_58872_needit.validateEmailAddress</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>On demand Script Include to validate email address syntax using regular expressions.</description>
        <name>validateEmailAddress</name>
        <script><![CDATA[function validateEmailAddress(emailStr){
    // Use JavaScript coercion to guarantee emailStr is a string
    emailStr = emailStr + '';
    // Compare emailStr against the allowed syntax as specified in the regular expression
    // If emailStr has allowed syntax, return true, else return false
    if(emailStr.match(/^(([^<>()\[\]\\.,;:\s@"]+(\.[^<>()\[\]\\.,;:\s@"]+)*)|(".+"))@((\[[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}])|(([a-zA-Z\-0-9]+\.)+[a-zA-Z]{2,}))$/)){
      return true;
    }
    else {
     return false;
    }
  }]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-11-09 08:58:51</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>ac0facf5d3c791105f2246c7c0085171</sys_id>
        <sys_name>validateEmailAddress</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_ac0facf5d3c791105f2246c7c0085171</sys_update_name>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
